1.0.name: wordpress/wp-quick-deploy-revisited
1.0.description:
WP Quick Deploy Revisited allows you to pick your favorite plugins and install them at once without hassle. WP Quick Deploy Revisited is one of the easiest ways to get the essential SEO plugins loaded after a fresh install of WordPress. There's no need to manually hunt for them again, you can simply install them in bulk. It also allows you to activate/deactivate, delete and update your plugins. Everything in one plugin!

In the revisited version you can also manage your own set of plugins. Export it and import it in a new installation.

Created by Valentin Mayr, in large parts based on the work of Vladimir Prelovac. Want to learn how to SEO your Blog to perfection?
